greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = least k such that the remainder when 7^k is divided by k is n.
link: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 with -1 for those entries where a(n) has not yet been found
mathematica: t = Table[0, {10000}]; k = 1; lst = {}; While[k < 4100000000, a = PowerMod[7, k, k]; If[ a<10001 && t[[a]]==0, t[[a]]=k; Print[{a,k}]]; k++ ]; t (* changed (to reflect the new limits) by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 17 2009 *)
results.author: _Ryan Propper_, Jun 12 2006
ext: a(36) = 10596486211 and later terms from _Ryan Propper_, Feb 02 2007
